title: List transfer runs
description: Lists all runs for a BigQuery Data Transfer Service transfer configuration.

objective.narrative: To monitor the status of data transfers, developers can list all the individual runs for a given transfer configuration. This is useful for auditing, debugging failed runs, or tracking data freshness.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_transferruns_list
regionTags.title: List transfer runs
regionTags.description: Lists all runs for a BigQuery Data Transfer Service transfer configuration.
